name: Tensorgrip® 701 Super Strength Contact Spray Adhesive
description: Tensorgrip® 701 Super Strength Contact Spray Adhesive is a super strength general purpose contact adhesive that performs many standard adhesive applications. This includes post-forming, bonding laminate, foam, fabric, sheet metal, leather, fiberglass plastics and laminates. Tensorgrip® 701 bonds melamine without the need for preparing the surface and also bonds carpet to staircases.
